title: Proper unordered pairs and triples (sets of size 2 and 3)

blocks.name: hashprlei
blocks.content: An unordered pair has at most two elements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: hash2pr
blocks.content: A set of size two is an unordered pair. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm hash2pr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wbr(c0, cen, c2o))
  mpcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wcel(c0, cfn))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wcel(c0, cfn))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wcel(c0, cfn)), wcel(nat2, cn0))
  2nn0()
  hashvnfin(c0, c1, nat2)
  adantld(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wbr(c0, cen, c2o))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2o)))
  eqeq2d(cfv(chash, c0), nat2, cfv(chash, c2o), wcel(c0, cfn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(nat2, cfv(chash, c2o)))
  eqcomi(nat2, cfv(chash, c2o))
  hash2()
  biimpd(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2o)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cfn), wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, c2o)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o)), wcel(c2o, cfn))
  ax-mp(wcel(c2o, cfn), wcel(c2o, com))

thm hash2pr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(# ` c0)= 2)→ ∃(s0, ∃(s1, c0 = { s0, s1 })))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(# ` c0)= 2), ∃(s0, ∃(s1, c0 = { s0, s1 })), c0[≅]2o)
  mpcom((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(# ` c0)= 2), c0[≅]2o, c0 ∈ Fin)
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, (# ` c0)= 2, c0 ∈ Fin)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ c1, ((# ` c0)= 2 → c0 ∈ Fin), 2 ∈ ℕ0)
  2nn0()
  hashvnfin(c0, c1, nat2)
  adantld(c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ c1, (# ` c0)= 2, c0[≅]2o)
  sylbid(c0 ∈ Fin, (# ` c0)= 2, c0[≅]2o, (# ` c0)=(# ` 2o))
  eqeq2d((# ` c0), nat2, (# ` 2o), c0 ∈ Fin)
  a1i(c0 ∈ Fin, 2 =(# ` 2o))
  eqcomi(nat2, (# ` 2o))
  hash2()
  biimpd(c0 ∈ Fin, (# ` c0)=(# ` 2o), c0[≅]2o)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ Fin, ((# ` c0)=(# ` 2o)↔ c0[≅]2o), 2o ∈ Fin)
  ax-mp(2o ∈ Fin, 2o ∈ _om)
  2onn()
  nnfi(c2o)
  hashen(c0, c2o)
  en2(s0, s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: hash2prde
blocks.content: A set of size two is an unordered pair of two different elements. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm hash2prde(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  hash2pr(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  2eximdv(s0, s1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  pm2.61ine(cv(s0), cv(s1), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  mpan2(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1)))
  equid(s1)
  sylbir(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1))))
  preqsn(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  impcomd(wceq(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  syl6bi(wceq(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, csn(cv(s1))))
  eqeq2(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1)), c0)
  syl5com(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s1))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1))
  syl6eq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1, cfv(chash, csn(cv(s1))), wceq(c0, csn(cv(s1))))
  fveq2(c0, csn(cv(s1)), chash)
  elv(s1, wceq(cfv(chash, csn(cv(s1))), nat1))
  hashsng(cv(s1), universe)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  syl6bi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat1), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(nat2, nat1))
  eqeq1(cfv(chash, c0), nat2, nat1)
  eqcoms(nat2, nat1, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ax-mp(wi(wceq(nat1, nat2), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wne(nat1, nat2))
  1ne2()
  sylbi(wne(nat1, nat2), wi(wceq(nat1, nat2), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wn(wceq(nat1, nat2)))
  df-ne(nat1, nat2)
  pm2.21(wceq(nat1, nat2), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  ax-1(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(chash, c0), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(chash, c0), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: hash2exprb
blocks.content: A set of size two is an unordered pair if and only if it contains two different elements. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm hash2exprb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  hash2prde(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  exlimdvv(s0, s1, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)))
  impcom(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  sylibrd(wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat2))
  biimpd(wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat2))
  a1i(wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat2)))
  el2v(s0, s1, wb(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), nat2)))
  hashprg(cv(s0), universe, cv(s1), universe)
  fveqeq2(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), chash, nat2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(chash, c0), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(chash, c0), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hash2exprb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →((# ` c0)= 2 ↔ ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 ≠ s1 ∧ c0 = { s0, s1 })))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈ c1, (# ` c0)= 2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 ≠ s1 ∧ c0 = { s0, s1 }))))
  ex(c0 ∈ c1, (# ` c0)= 2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 ≠ s1 ∧ c0 = { s0, s1 }))))
  hash2prde(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  exlimdvv(s0, s1, c0 ∈ c1, (s0 ≠ s1 ∧ c0 = { s0, s1 }), (# ` c0)= 2)
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, ((s0 ≠ s1 ∧ c0 = { s0, s1 })→(# ` c0)= 2))
  impcom(s0 ≠ s1, c0 = { s0, s1 }, (# ` c0)= 2)
  sylibrd(c0 = { s0, s1 }, s0 ≠ s1, (# ` c0)= 2, (# ` { s0, s1 })= 2)
  biimpd(c0 = { s0, s1 }, s0 ≠ s1, (# ` { s0, s1 })= 2)
  a1i(c0 = { s0, s1 }, (s0 ≠ s1 ↔(# ` { s0, s1 })= 2))
  el2v(s0, s1, (s0 ≠ s1 ↔(# ` { s0, s1 })= 2))
  hashprg(s0, universe, s1, universe)
  fveqeq2(c0, { s0, s1 }, chash, nat2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (# ` c0), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (# ` c0), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
}

  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

  prid1(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)

  vex(s1)

  eleq2(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s0))

  bicomi(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

blocks.name: prprrab
blocks.content: The set of proper pairs of elements of a given set expressed in two ways. (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2020.)

  syl6bbr(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  biantrud(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  sylibr(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wne(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat0)))
  mtbiri(wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(nat2, nat0))

  df-rab(s0, cdif(cpw(c0), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))
}

blocks.name: nehash2
blocks.content: The cardinality of a set with two distinct elements. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm nehash2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c3))
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, cpr(c2, c3)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(c2, c3)), nat2), wne(c2, c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wne(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(c2, c3)), nat2)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))
  hashprg(c2, c0, c3, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cfv(chash, cpr(c2, c3)), cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpr(c2, c3), c0))
  prssd(c2, c3, c0, w0)
  hashss(c0, c1, cpr(c2, c3))

blocks.pretty:
thm nehash2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 2[≤](# ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≠ c3)
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(nat2, cle, (# ` c0), (# ` { c2, c3 }), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (# ` { c2, c3 })= 2, c2 ≠ c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 ≠ c3 ↔(# ` { c2, c3 })= 2), c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c0)
  hashprg(c2, c0, c3, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (# ` { c2, c3 })[≤](# ` c0), c0 ∈ c1, { c2, c3 } ⊆ c0)
  prssd(c2, c3, c0, w0)
  hashss(c0, c1, { c2, c3 })
}

thm hashdmpropge2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

thm hashdmpropge2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c9)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → { < c1, c5 >, < c3, c7 > } ⊆ c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)), dom(c0)∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ≠ hs1)))
  dmexd(c0, c9, w0)
  mpd(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ≠ hs1)), { c1, c3 } ⊆ dom(c0))
  eqsstr3d({ c1, c3 }, dom(c0), dom({ < c1, c5 >, < c3, c7 > }), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, dom({ < c1, c5 >, < c3, c7 > })= { c1, c3 }, c5 ∈ c6, c7 ∈ c8)
  dmpropg(c5, c6, c7, c8, c1, c3)
  syl(w0, dom({ < c1, c5 >, < c3, c7 > })⊆ dom(c0), { < c1, c5 >, < c3, c7 > } ⊆ c0)
  dmss({ < c1, c5 >, < c3, c7 > }, c0)
  sylbird(w0, { c1, c3 } ⊆ dom(c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ≠ hs1)), (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c3 ∈ dom(c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c3 ∈ dom(c0))↔ { c1, c3 } ⊆ dom(c0)), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  prssg(c1, c2, c3, c4, dom(c0))
  syl(w0, ((c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c3 ∈ dom(c0))→ ∃(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ≠ hs1))), c1 ≠ c3)
  expcom(c1 ≠ c3, (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ c3 ∈ dom(c0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ≠ hs1)))
  3expa(c1 ∈ dom(c0), c3 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ≠ c3, ∃(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ≠ hs1)))
  rspc2ev(hs0, hs1, c1, dom(c0), c3, dom(c0), c1 ≠ c3, hs0 ≠ hs1, c1 ≠ hs1)

  diff.hs1.w(c1 ≠ c3)

blocks.name: hashge3el3dif
blocks.content: A set with size at least 3 has at least 3 different elements. In contrast to ~ hashge2el2dif , which has an elementary proof, the dominance relation and 1-1 functions from a set with three elements which are known to be different are used to prove this theorem. Although there is also an elementary proof for this theorem, it might be much longer. After all, this proof should be kept because it can be used as template for proofs for higher cardinalities. (Contributed by AV, 20-Mar-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm hashge3el3dif(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  sylbid(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wbr(ctp(emptycls, csn(emptycls), csn(csn(emptycls))), cdom, c0))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(ctp(emptycls, csn(emptycls), csn(csn(emptycls))), cdom, c0), wbr(cfv(chash, ctp(emptycls, csn(emptycls), csn(csn(emptycls)))), cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  breq1d(nat3, cle, cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, ctp(emptycls, csn(emptycls), csn(csn(emptycls)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(nat3, cfv(chash, ctp(emptycls, csn(emptycls), csn(csn(emptycls))))))
  eqcomi(nat3, cfv(chash, ctp(emptycls, csn(emptycls), csn(csn(emptycls)))))

blocks.name: elss2prb

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), diffss(s0, s1))

  fveqeq2(cv(s0), c0, chash, nat2)
  impbii(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  imp(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))

  hash2prb(s1, s2, c0, cpw(c1))
  syld(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wi(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))), wss(c0, c1))
  ssrexv(s1, c0, c1, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  reximdv(s1, c1, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wi(wrex(s2, c0, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wss(c0, c1))

  ex(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)))

  prelpwi(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cpw(c1))))
  eleq1(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cpw(c1))
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, c0), nat2, cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  fveq2(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), chash)
  impcom(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wa(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat2))
  adantr(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat2)))
  biimpcd(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2))), nat2))

  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cpw(c1))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(chash, c0), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chash, c0)
  diff.chash.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, cpw(c1))
  diff.cpw.s(s2, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cfv(chash, c0), nat2)

blocks.name: hash2sspr
blocks.content: A subset of size two is an unordered pair of elements of its superset. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jul-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 4-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm hash2sspr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylbir(wa(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat2))))
  elrab(hs0, c0, cpw(c1), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat2), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, chash, nat2)
  sylbi(wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat2))), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  elss2prb(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1)
  reximi(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  reximi(s1, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  simpr(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), nat2))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: exprelprel
blocks.content: If there is an element of the set of subsets with two elements in a set, an unordered pair of sets is in the set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm exprelprel(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  rexlimiv(s0, crab(s1, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cpw(c0), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s1)), nat2))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1)))), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wa(wne(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  elss2prb(s1, s2, s3, cv(s0), c0)
  com12(wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wa(wne(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1))))
  reximdv(s2, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s3, c0, wa(wne(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3))))), wrex(s3, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1)))
  reximdv(s3, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wne(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1))
  biimpcd(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wne(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1))
  adantl(wne(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s0), cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1)))
  eleq1(cv(s0), cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1)
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1)))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s3, c0, wcel(cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cpr(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, cv(s2), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm exprelprel(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ { s1 ∈ P(c0)|(# ` s1)= 2 }, s0 ∈ c1)→ ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0, { s2, s3 } ∈ c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
